notifications.min-recipient-amount-reached: There must be at least one recipient
notifications.max-size-exceeded-err: You cannot upload a file exceeding { maxSize } MB
notifications.incorrect-file-type-err: You cannot upload a { type} file. Allowed types: { allowedTypes }
notifications.invalid-dimensions-err: You cannot upload an image with dimensions less than { minWidth }x{ minHeight }

errors.default: Something bad happened. Please try again later or contact the system owner.

validation.field-error_minLength: This field must contain minimum { minLength } symbols
validation.field-error_maxLength: This field must contain maximum { maxLength } symbols
validation.field-error_alphaNum: Value should consists of alphanumeric values (A-Z, a-z, 0-9)
validation.field-error_alpha: Value should consists of alphabetic characters (A-Z, a-z)
validation.field-error_uniqueValue: Value is not unique, please try another one
validation.field-error_birthday: Value is not correct birthday date (YYYY-MM-DD), please try another one
validation.field-error_email: This field should be a valid email
validation.field-error_recipientEmail: Recipient's email cannot be equal to the current one
